item.title: 2018-2019 NBA Champion Toronto Raptors Analysis
item.description: Toronto Raptors won the 2018-2019 NBA Championship, which is really exciting. I watched the playoffs even months after the season was over. As a data analyst, I find datas of Raptors and did this analysis. Since tree methods could apperantly display the relations between the feature variables and the response variable, it is appropriate to use them to reveal the factors of wining. library(readr) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) library(magrittr) library(party) library(rpart) library(rpart.

item.title: Credit Card Approval Prediction Using Sklearn
NBA Player Salary Prediction: Python Application Using AdaBoost Algorithm
Xiao Song
item.description: Chinese version PDF CONTACT Email：malcolm@xsong.ltd Github：https://github.com/ECSTA7Y Website：https://xsong.ltd SOFTWARE & Programming SKILLS R, LaTeX, Stata Python, SQL, SPSS EDUCATION East China Normal University 2016-09~Today School of Social Development (Overall GPA：3.64 /4 | Top 10%) Sun Yat-Sun University Exchange Student 2018-02~2018-07 TRAINING EXPERIENCE Gouxionghui 2019-05 Online internship Credit Card Approval Analysis Using Python’s Pandas, Numpy, and scikit-learn libraries for data wrangling and modeling.
